original_title: Sesame Street: Big Bird's Story Time
overview: Everybody's heard about this bird! Sesame Street's old fuss and feathers, Big Bird, will entrance kids with this collection of stories that only he can tell. Big Bird's gathered his favorite yarns for a truly entertaining, once-upon-a-time reverie that might appeal to quite a few adults, too.
title: Sesame Street: Big Bird's Story Time
